title: Issue 35/51 sync fixes complete
details:
Fixed three critical issues from diagnostic documents:

1. Issue #35: Missing createQuickTabWindow import in UICoordinator.js - Added ES module import replacing misleading /* global */ comment

2. Issue #51: Position/size sync across tabs - Enhanced StateManager.hydrate() with change detection, added state:quicktab:changed event, UICoordinator listens for this event to update already-rendered tabs

3. Manager Panel sync issues - Added stateChangedWhileClosed tracking, storage.onChanged listener for cross-tab sync, defensive checks for button handlers, removed setTimeout race condition

Key patterns used:
- EventBus events for cross-component communication
- storage.onChanged for cross-tab synchronization
- Change detection in hydrate() to emit granular events
- Defensive programming with method existence checks
